titles.title: Expressing support for the annual Childhood Apraxia of Speech Awareness Day on May 14, 2022, coinciding with Better Hearing and Speech Month.
Expressing support for the annual Childhood Apraxia of Speech Awareness Day on May 14, 2022, coinciding with Better Hearing and Speech Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Childhood Apraxia of Speech Awareness Day. Childhood apraxia of speech is a neurological condition that affects the brain pathways involved in planning the sequence of movements necessary to produce speech.
